text: Patriarch Leontius may refer to: *Leontius I of Jerusalem, Patriarch of Jerusalem in 911–928 *Leontius of Bulgaria, Patriarch of Bulgaria c. 918–c. 927 *Leontius of Alexandria, Greek Patriarch of Alexandria in 1052–1059 *Leontius of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1189
title: Patriarch Leontius
